attributes.action: Scrap car parking fees for cars parking at service stations for more than 2 hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are plenty of roadsigns on the motorways suggesting drivers to take regular breaks. When the free parking limit is only 2 hours, drivers have been ticketed if they are there for more than 2 hours,

The govt needs to scrap service stations charging drivers for more than a couple of hours. Obviously, if there are people using the service station to 'camp' on, then fine these people. Not the people who are just tired and need 2-3 hours kip.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
